key_features:
Enjoy up to 8% cashback* when you dine, shop and live your life, both locally and overseas.
- 8% cashback* on dining, shopping and entertainment
- 5% cashback on fuel at Caltex and Shell gas stations in Singapore
- 0.3% cashback on other spends
- Terms and Conditions apply.
- 8% cashback* on dining, shopping and entertainment
- 5% cashback on fuel at Caltex and Shell gas stations in Singapore
Savour sweet deals of 15% discount at over 200 restaurants through our curated Live+ Dining Programme
Enjoy 1-for-1 dining, travel and lifestyle partners through your complimentary ENTERTAINER with HSBC app

Enjoy savings when you purchase movie tickets and HSBC's Movie Cards at any Golden Village multiplexes in Singapore.
*Min. spend and other terms and conditions apply. Valid till 31 Dec 2024.

eligibility: MoneySmart Exclusive gift is applicable for New-to-HSBC cardholders only
Customers need to apply through MoneySmart to be eligible
Applicants need to provide HSBC their consent to receive marketing and promotional materials from HSBC at the time of submitting their application

fees.annual_fee: S$196.2 (inclusive of GST). First-year annual fee waived
fees.annual_fee_waiver: For the second year onwards, we'll waive the Annual Fee for your card if you spend more than S$12,500 per year
fees.annual_interest_rate: Effective Rate: 27.8% p.a. (minimum), Minimum Charge: S$2.50
fees.late_payment_fee: S$100 if the minimum payment is not received on or before the Payment Due Date
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 100% of the monthly instalment plan amount and interest/fees, 1% of remaining outstanding balances, excess amount above your credit limit (if your account is overlimit) or $50 (in the currency of your account), whichever is greater
fees.annual_interest_rate_on_cash_advance: Effective Rate: 28.5% p.a. (minimum), Minimum Charge: S$2.50
